Class ClipViewerFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.weebly.opus1269.clipman.ui.clips.ClipViewerFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.arch.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class ClipViewerFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
implements android.view.View.OnClickListener
    A fragment to view a ClipItem
